caption.center: LAWRENCE A. FESTA, JR., Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: An appeal from the Circuit Court for Okaloosa County. Terrance R. Ketchel, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Lawrence A. Festa, Jr., pro se, Appellant.
Pamela Jo Bondi, Attorney General, and Thomas H. Duffy, Assistant Attorney General, Tallahassee, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
BENTON, C.J., DAVIS and THOMAS, JJ., CONCUR.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE MOTION FOR REHEARING AND DISPOSITION THEREOF IF FILED
